string.name: reason
string.value: These may include lock screen notifications, banners, badges, sounds, and vibrations. You can change this in Settings.

string.name: reason_simple
string.value: These may include banners, badges, and sounds. You can change this in Settings.

string.name: reason_zyt
string.value: These may include lock screen notifications, banners, badges, sounds, and vibrations. You can change these settings in DroiTong > App management.

string.name: reason_tv
string.value: Notifications will be delivered as banners. You can change your notification preferences at any time in Settings.
